name: Another Cheat Downloader
description: A MinUI pak for downloading cheat files from the Libretro database.
author: mikecosentino

changelog.v0.1.3: Fixed crash on launch caused by corrupted cache_system_cheats function and missing find_matching_cheats function. Added error handling for jq processing failures and cleaned up temporary raw API response files.
changelog.v0.1.2: Fixed an issue with status screens not going away.
changelog.v0.1.1: Thanks for the help from the NextUI discord for testing and feedback! Lots of fixes.
